VII.i.3.B.6.a
.
Definition:  Stepchild
According to
38 CFR 3.57(b)
, the term
stepchild
refers to the legitimate or illegitimate child of a Veteran’s spouse.  It also refers to the child of a
surviving spouse
whose marriage to a Veteran VA has deemed valid.
Exception
:  Follow the instructions in
M21-1, Part VII, Subpart i, 3.B.6.b
when a child is born to the same-sex spouse of a Veteran during the course of their marriage.
Reference
:  For more information on deemed-valid marriages, see
M21-1, Part VII, Subpart i, 2.D.7
.
title: M21-1, Part VII, Subpart i, Chapter 3, Section B - Biological Children, Adopted Children, and Stepchildren
